title.rendered: “Remembering IDF Casualties and Updates on Seriously Injured Soldiers in Recent Gaza Strip Conflicts”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesperson regarding the names of the two IDF casualties for whom notification has been given to their families: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC30122023IEURBGIEBV

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where their details and photos of the casualties are published and updated:
https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, in the event in which Konstantin Sushko, may his memory be a blessing, was killed, a reserve soldier from Battalion 7086, Golani Brigade, was seriously injured.

Additionally, a combat officer in the ‘Tzabar’ Battalion (432), Givati Brigade, was seriously injured in a battle in the northern Gaza Strip. A reserve soldier in the Engineering Battalion 7107, Nahal Brigade, was seriously injured in a battle in the northern Gaza Strip.

Moreover, a reserve soldier in the Paratroopers Brigade 5352, ‘Ram’ Formation (179), was seriously injured in a battle in the central Gaza Strip.

Furthermore, a soldier in Battalion 932, Nahal Brigade, was seriously injured in an operational activity in the vicinity of the Gaza Strip.

Also, an IDF reserve soldier from Battalion 7018 was seriously injured in a car-ramming attack that occurred today (Saturday) in the Judea Brigade area.

The injured were evacuated for medical treatment and their families were updated.
